titles.title: Liberian Refugee Immigration Fairness Act of 2007
A bill to provide for the adjustment of status of certain nationals of Liberia to that of lawful permanent residence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/16/2007--Introduced.
Liberian Refugee Immigration Fairness Act of 2007 - Provides for the permanent resident status adjustment of certain Liberian nationals.
